clinical_study.brief_title: The Change of Pulmonary Blood Flow During One Lung Ventilation
clinical_study.official_title: The Changes of Pulmonary Blood Flow in Nondependent Lung During One Lung Ventilation

brief_summary.textblock: To investigate the changes of regional pulmonary blood flow in nondependent lung by transesophageal echocardiography during one lung ventilation

intervention.description: measure the pulmonary blood flow in nondependent lung during 30min one lung ventilation

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- adult patients (ASA physical status I-III) requiring OLV for selective thoracic surgery.
Exclusion Criteria:
- chronic obstructive pulmonary disease
- hypertension
- cardiovascular
- esophageal disease

responsible_party.organization: Department of Anesthesiology, West China Hospital, Sichuan University.
